messages.messageBody:
Oops, I screwed up. So many shows so little time. It was Dateline that is
having the show. Here's the promo for it.

Mary B


SUNDAY, NOVEMBER 17
7:00 P.M. ET -
Connie and Earl Bartram adopted their Korean-born son, Eric, when he was
just two months old. But as Eric got older, he had questions Connie and Earl
couldn�t answer. So the family traveled 6,000 miles to meet Eric�s
biological parents and discover the missing pieces from his past. Torn
between the family that raised him and the one he�d never known, in this
�Dateline NBC�
